properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 3 at 1:25PM PST until February 6 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and steep
wind-driven seas of 8 to 12 ft through tonight. Tuesday
afternoon, seas once again become steep and wind-driven at 8 to
10 feet.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...The current Small craft Advisory is in effect until 4 AM
PST Tuesday. The second Small Craft Advisory is in effect from
1 PM Tuesday to 10 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds and/or steep seas could capsize or damage
smaller vessels.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should remain in port and avoid the area of hazardous
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY
